item.title: CVE-2024-37476|2024-08-02T03:57:38.913Z -- automattic -- newspack%20campaigns
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Automattic Newspack Campaigns allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Newspack Campaigns: from n/a through 2.31.1.
